ygData.subject: Re: training points after jewelry is maxed
ygData.msgSnippet: actually I have heard a good theory that has werked eversince I tried it.......DONT TRAIN until your JUST about to level......then run over to the guild master
ygData.messageBody:
actually I have heard a good theory that has werked eversince I tried
it.......DONT TRAIN until your JUST about to level......then run over to the
guild master and train EVERYTHING you can in your magics FIRST up to the
MAX........what this dus is allows ALL your magic skillls to be maxed at
every level....most of them will be due to your own use but I know as a
Druid I hardly use Divination and Conjuration......actually I use them alot
its just they are tuff to get up cuase I got them late and didnt practice
much.......but if you max everything out RGHT before you level youll be
maxed all the time.....and wont have much training to do....then you can
save your opoints and things for stuff like RESEARCH!!!>....and
SPECIALIZATION!!!.......hope this helps....


Neurosiz
